Text: Thanks EZTV, you're my one and only
What ever happened to uploading AVIs?  All of a sudden EVERY video you upload is x264...  And the only filetypes that work on an Xbox are AVIs.  So, so frustrating.
rjcripe: Updated my xbox360 with SystemUpdate_14719_USB.zip, which might allow it to play mp4's - not positive. You might want to check out updates...
